alert.note: Alert for Bleckley; Dodge; Houston; Twiggs (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 25 at 11:26AM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Laurens, north central Dodge, southeastern Twiggs, Bleckley and east central Houston Counties through 1215 PM EDT... At 1126 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Tarversville, or 9 miles northwest of Cochran, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, nickel sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cochran, Chester, Danville, Montrose, Allentown, Coley Station, Tarversville, Yonkers, Magnolia, Rowland, Royal, District Path, Goldsboro, Rebie, Cary, Porter and Bullard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 500 PM EDT for central Georgia.
